summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 FORD FUSION ENERGI. WHILE DRIVING 50 MPH, THE VEHICLE MADE A GRINDING SOUND. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED DURING THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER (ART HILL FORD LINCOLN, 901 W LINCOLN HWY, MERRILLVILLE, IN 46410) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION FAILED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 137,000.
